website_summaries.verdict: Although the prospect of scheduled blinds is cool, and the basic functions work well, outfitting a whole home with Somfy's Motorized Blinds and the MyLink hubs to run it would cost thousands.
pros: Somfy's app is intuitive, its hardware is pretty reliable, and waking up to a home that opens your blinds for you would be just plain cool
cons: The features are sparse, and the system often requires a separate product for each new feature you want to access
Overall, the price for admission is way too high

customer_reviews.title: Try this if you can't locate your somfy device!
customer_reviews.text: I got it working with my roller shades and iPhone after many many attempts. Through trial and error the steps below worked for me. For those who got the error somfy mylink cannot be found, try this: 1. Use a 2.4ghz wifi network 2. Go through the setup process on the app. After you enter your WiFi network password it goes through a 4 step process to locate your somfy device. At the 4th step, use your remote and move all your shades up or down (do this while the app is locating your Somfy motor!) This allowed the device to discover my somfy motors. Nothing else worked and the troubleshooting guides are non existent. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this unit, get Bond smart home
customer_reviews.text: Somfy blinds are a great product but this unit performs horribly. I have a very stable wireless connection in my small apartment, but somfy mylink has a Very unreliable connection to the blinds, always showing a weak connection even having the unit next to any of my antennas. Most of the time there is a blind not responding. Technical support was useless solving the issue. Alexa integration suks and Mobile Application is super slow and has a horrible interface. ALTERNATIVE: get the BOND smart home, it solves all the issues and works great with control 4 and Alexa.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it doesn't work

So, apparently the device does actually connect to my network, also indicated by the solid green light, but either the application or the device is defective. customer_reviews.title: Works ONLY while you're at home but not remotely as described.... false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Total false advertising about the device's capabilities on where you can control blinds, awning...etc. The box and the description indicates "Always have control of your motorized applications regardless of where you are." This is ONLY applicable when your phone or tablet is on the SAME WIFI NETWORK. As soon as you're outside of your wifi network or anytime you're on cellular network, you WILL NOT HAVE CONTROL of any of the devices. SO "...Regardless of where you are" is completely false advertisement. Perhaps Somfy had wanted to be that way, but never rolled out the firmware nor the app to support that statement. BTW, I did update the firmware and the app to the most current public release.

product_meta.title: Somfy MyLink RTS Smartphone and Tablet Interface/WiFi to Radio Technology Control Blinds with phone!(MPN #1811403)
product_meta.description: Add smartphone/tablet remote control to all of your Somfy RTS motorized devices (sold separately) with the Somfy myLink RTS Smartphone and Tablet Interface. Designed to work with the free Somfy myLink app for iOS and Android, this plug-in module works as a simple signal converter. It receives your app commands over Wi-Fi and transmits the equivalent RTS signals to your RTS devices. The app works even when you're away from home, so you can control your motorized shades, blinds, and more from anywhere you have an Internet connection. The Somfy myLink Interface is designed for quick DIY setup. Just plug the module into a standard power outlet and use the app's on-screen setup wizard to add the module to your home network. Once the interface module is connected to Wi-Fi, you can easily add your RTS devices to the app interface. About the myLink App: Available through the Apple and Google Play stores, the Somfy myLink app gives you complete control over your RTS devices, organized by room in your app's interface. The app supports up to 5 channels, so you can control up to 5 individual RTS devices OR groups of multiple RTS devices. You can also create scenes and schedules directly through the app. If you need to control more than 5 groups of RTS devices, you can use multiple Somfy myLink Interfaces together. Each additional interface will add 5 more channels. CONTENTS: myLink Interface Module, Quick Start Guide. NOTE: RTS devices sold separately. Requires a wireless router and Internet service.
